body_html:
A CPU-ONLY and experimental non-official Debian/Sid package is available here:
http://debomatic-amd64.debian.net/debomatic/unstable/pool/pytorch_0.1.7+0.1/python3-torch_0.1.7+0.1_amd64.deb

Note, the above package was built with -march=native flag on E5-2697v3 CPU, so it may not work for your machine. To build a pytorch.deb locally, follow the instructions at https://github.com/cdluminate/pytorch .

Note, the above package was built with -march=native flag on E5-2697v3 CPU, so it may not work for your machine. To build a pytorch.deb locally, follow the instructions at https://github.com/cdluminate/pytorch .
body:
A CPU-ONLY and experimental non-official Debian/Sid package is available here:
http://debomatic-amd64.debian.net/debomatic/unstable/pool/pytorch_0.1.7+0.1/python3-torch_0.1.7+0.1_amd64.deb

Note, the above package was built with `-march=native` flag on E5-2697v3 CPU, so it may not work for your machine. To build a pytorch.deb locally, follow the instructions at https://github.com/cdluminate/pytorch .
